title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Skills: Internet-Based Task Support System for Engineering Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can describe the core components of an internet-based task support system.
Learners can independently design and implement an engineering education project applying the IPSS_EE model.
Learners can develop team-based task strategies using collaboration tools in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
